```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
library(cakeR)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)
library(kableExtra)

d <- 10 #input your height
h <- 4 #input your diameter
filling <- 'buttercream' #input the type of filling
fondant <- 'white' #input which type of fondant
type <- 'vanilla' #input the type of cake

vol <- pi * (d/2)^2 * h
surf_area <- (2 * pi * (d/2) * h) + (2 * pi * (d/2)^2)

cake <- cake_round(d,h,filling,fondant,type)
i <- cake[[1]]
fill <- cake[[2]]
fon <- cake[[3]]

```

## Cake details: 

* Cake dimensions: `r d` x `r h` inches

* Cake type: `r str_to_title(type)`

* Filling type: `r str_to_title(filling)`

* Fondant type: `r str_to_title(fondant)`

## Cake Price:

```{r price,message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}

iprice <- sum(i$price)
fillprice <- sum(fill$price[-1])
fonprice <- fon[1,]$price

total <- iprice + fillprice + fonprice

cake_name <- paste(str_to_title(gsub('_',' ',type)),' cake',sep='')
fill_name <- paste(str_to_title(gsub('_',' ',filling)),' filling',sep='')
fon_name <- paste(str_to_title(fondant),' fondant',sep='')

prices <- tibble(Category = c(cake_name,fill_name,fon_name,'Total Price'),
                 Price = c(iprice,fillprice,fonprice,total))

kable(prices,'html') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width=T) %>%
  row_spec(4,bold=T,color='white',background='black')
```
